short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor changes on part of web pages or a whole web page and get informed of the changes as an email or call to a webhook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you have something on the web that you need to keep an eye on? Well with GrabzIt's Web Monitor you can. Simply watch the whole page or part of it and get notified by email when it changes, or send a call to a webhook if you want an app to deal with it.

Then set how frequently you want to check for changes and you are done!

Once you have installed your extension just follow the instructions in the extension popup to sign up and get converting!
